description: Have a go at dukkah-crusted tofu served on a bed of brown rice, capsicum, spinach and kaleslaw. This tasty vegetarian meal is ready in 20 minutes.
name: Dukkah-Crusted Tofu & Warm Brown Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice according to packet instructions.

Meanwhile, cut each tofu block into 4 slices. Place tofu slices on a board. Rub with half the oil and sprinkle with dukkah. Heat remaining oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Cook tofu, in 2 batches, for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and heated through.
Place kaleslaw, reserving dressing from kit, capsicum, rice and spinach in a large bowl. Add reserved dressing and toss to combine. Season with pepper.
Serve rice salad topped with tofu and mint.
